articles.title: Why do Gen Z have a growing appetite for retro tech? - BBC
articles.description: Gen Z are going retro, with studies showing a resurgence in people buying tech in the modern age that can be dated back decades.
articles.content:
Ryley BowmanBBC Scotland News
Kyle, 21 got a PSP to relive his childhood
Gen Z are going retro. People in their teens and early 20s are increasingly turning to old school tech in a bid to unplug fr… [+4928 chars]
